#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	string str;
	cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin >> str;
		int length = str.length();
		if(0 != length % 2)
		{
			cout << "NO" << endl;
			continue;
		}
		int flag = 0;
		for(int i = 0;  i < length; i++)
		{
			if('T' == str[i]) flag ++;
			else flag --;
			if(flag < 0) break;
		}
		if(0 == flag)
			cout << "YES" << endl;
		else cout << "NO" << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
